caption.p: SEM and TEM images of 3D flower-like MoS 2-PrGO sandwich composites, (A) SEM image of GO, (B) SEM image of 3D flower-like MoS 2-PrGO sandwich composites, (C,D) TEM and HRTEM images of 3D flower-like MoS 2-PrGO sandwich composites, (E) Bright-field TEM image and corresponding EDX elemental mapping images of 3D flower-like MoS 2-PrGO sandwich composites.
